snippet.title: Mario Kart 64 - Amped Up - F3 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
As seen in the F3 2021: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1DlhJbiMsW0

Download Link: 
https://patch.wedarobi.com/mk64_amped_up
Use a "Mario Kart 64 (U) [!].z64" ROM to patch the game.
Manual Patch Link: 
https://mega.nz/folder/9BB32Cib#ISfFcu6hrF7CCl-2FTHaAA

A Mario Kart 64 modification, which adds 12 new courses to the game, complete with new music and a seperate "N64 Coin Mode"
Currently, there are three cups with 4 custom courses each.
It adds the N64 coin challenge. Collect 8 coins scattered around the course and get a starman power up, if you get them all.
Each collected coin also increases your top speed.
The options menu on the title screen has a variety of settings to change.

Check out the OverKart 64 channel, if you want to see more custom tracks and to get the recent news about MK64 modding: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxKsmdUQlAGeVMfpfy0D7gA
Also join the Discord server to discuss, view progress and download new courses: https://discord.gg/NNkQSz9

Links:
-Twitter: https://twitter.com/Litronom
-Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/Litronom/
-Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/litronom
